did.unittitle: A view of the bay of Hallefax on May ye 5, 1759 at noon [watercolor]

repository.corpname: The New York Public Library. Manuscripts and Archives Division.

address.addressline: Fifth Avenue at 42nd Street, New York, NY 10018-2788

did.abstract: This ink and watercolor drawing represents the sailing of the British fleet under Rear-Admiral Philip Durell in the 1759 expedition against Québec, depicting eighteen ships in the Halifax harbor. There is a textual explanation just below the image. Described in the New York Public Library Bulletin, vol. 40 (1936) pages 419-420

prefercite.p: A view of the bay of Hallefax on May ye 5, 1759 at noon [watercolor], Manuscripts and Archives Division, The New York Public Library
